text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Big Bubble: $()$(#ff0000)2 DMG/2s (Destroys Armor, but not Shields)
$(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Amphibious. 25% Big Bubble/shot if in water. Extinguishes Zombies.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)"How DARE a ZOMBIE have nicer things than me!?", says Narcissus, enraged. "If I can't have nice things, no one can!"

pages.title: âœ‚ Spear Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)They sometimes shoot Big Bubbles that destroys armor if in water.
